modName: Auriels Bow Retexture - 4 versions DAWNGUARD REQUIRED
summary: Add\'s 4 new textures of Auriel\'s Bow for Skyrim, each at 2048x2048
descriptionHtml:
[b]*NEW VERSIONS [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31791]HERE[/url]*[/b]

[b]THANKS FOR ALL THE SUPPORT AND ENDORSEMENTS[/b]

This is my first mod, feel free to ask for a change or provide feedback.

Ever tried to use Dwarven Armour or Ebony Armour with Auriel\'s Bow and find it doesn\'t fit well? This gives you some colour options while increasing the quality of the texture (Vanilla are 512x512, these are 2048x2048)

INSTALL:
Pick a texture and download it.
Extract it.
Place the \"Data\" folder in your main Skyrim directory.

You may need to reset the Archive Invalidation.

Use this mod how you like, upload elsewhere, modify, etc.

Mods used in the screenshots are:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] - thank you apachii
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812]Better Females by Bella[/url] - thank you BellaGail
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12525]DynaVision[/url] - thank you Gopher
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7654]Realistic Lighting with Customization[/url] - thank you Plutoman101
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13268]WATER - Water And Terrain Enhancement Redux[/url] - thank you SparrowPrince and OpticShooter
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2933]Crafting 300 - Armoury of Tamriel[/url] - thank you ByblosHex

If I\'ve forgotten any other mods, sorry.

Thanks to Bethesda for Skyrim
author: kashif101
